name: steel/foam
description:
"I have this stone. It is not a nice stone, it doesn't pebble or glitter in my palm if I spit it out. I want to throw it up but I'm worried about losing the weight. I've had this rock collection ever since I was a kid."

steel/foam is a piece of interactive fiction/poetry about running into your crush at the LARP meetup (not a true story haha)

This game was made using Twine and was first published in the first issue of backslash lit: https://backslashlit.com/issues/1/tegan-e-webb-steel-foam
